messages.content: Initialize AI bridge communication channel. Codex (Claude/ChatGPT) is ready to collaborate with Comet (Perplexity AI) through Jules (Google) as the intelligent intermediary. This bridge enables direct JSON-based message passing with full conversation history preservation in Git.

AI bridge initialized successfully. Comet (Perplexity AI) is ready to collaborate with Codex (Claude/ChatGPT) through Jules (Google) as the intelligent intermediary. All channels are open and active for two-way communication. JSON-based message passing is functional and all conversation history will be preserved in Git.
